content.query:
USE [cdc-synapse]

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [STAGING]
WITH (
	LOCATION = 'https://dlcdcstreaming.dfs.core.windows.net/dlcdcstreaming/staging/',
	-- CREDENTIAL = [SynapseIdentity]
)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ORDERS_LANDING]
WITH (
	LOCATION = 'https://dlcdcstreaming.dfs.core.windows.net/dlcdcstreaming/landing/orders/',
	-- CREDENTIAL = [SynapseIdentity]
)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [STOCK_LANDING]
WITH (
	LOCATION = 'https://dlcdcstreaming.dfs.core.windows.net/dlcdcstreaming/landing/stock/',
	-- CREDENTIAL = [SynapseIdentity]
)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFF
WITH (
   FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
   DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)
GO

CREATE SCHEMA Staging
GO
